attributes.action: Have David Cameron investigated by Parliamentary Commissioner for Standards.
attributes.background: It was announced today, the 23rd April, that the Parliamentary Commissioner for Standards has decided not to investigate David Cameron over secret offshore deals, that were exposed during the Panama leaks scandal. I demand that the Parliamentary Commissioner for Standards DOES investigate Mr Cameron

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. That would be a decision for the Parliamentary Commissioner for Standards, who is independent of the Government and Parliament.
